request.positivePrompt: Book cover illustration for "Das flüsternde Licht im Wald". Main characters Alexander, Adrian with Frau Müller, Hase Hoppel in an exciting scene. Eine rasante, warme Suche nach dem verlorenen Licht führt zwei ungleiche Kinder tief in den Wald. Mut, Freundlichkeit und ein kleines Geheimnis verbinden sie und bringen das Dorf zum Leuchten. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Frau Müller: Frau Müller • ['Frau Müller', ' 78 years'] Hase Hoppel: Hase Hoppel • ['Hase Hoppel rabbit', ' medium-sized'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Alexander (8-10y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
